${ModID}:Knighthood.NAME: Knighthood
${ModID}:Knighthood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Choose a card in hand to Upgrade permanently. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${ModID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Burns to your hand.

${ModID}:Minniegun.NAME: Minniegun
${ModID}:Minniegun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Shuffle a *Jam into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Ouroboros.NAME: Ouroboros
${ModID}:Ouroboros.DESCRIPTION: The first time you fully block any source of damage each turn, gain 1 Strength.
${ModID}:Ouroboros.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time you fully block any source of damage each turn, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Corset.NAME: Corset
${ModID}:Corset.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Jam to your hand.

${ModID}:Jam.NAME: Jam
${ModID}:Jam.DESCRIPTION: Take 3 damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MantisStrike.NAME: Mantis Strike
${ModID}:MantisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat whenever you fully block a source of damage this turn.

${ModID}:RestorationDetonation.NAME: R. Detonation
${ModID}:RestorationDetonation.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Enemy loses twice the amount of HP gained. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RestorationDetonation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Enemy loses three times the amount of HP gained. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SignInBlood.NAME: Sign in Blood
${ModID}:SignInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Take 3 damage. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength.

${ModID}:SpreadingSpores.NAME: Spreading Spores
${ModID}:SpreadingSpores.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile.
${ModID}:SpreadingSpores.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile.
